plugin.name: Hyperlink_URL
plugin.author: Nick Gammon
plugin.purpose: Makes a URL on a line into a hyperlink
plugin.description:
Detects text starting with HTTP:xxx and makes that part into a hyperlink.
Limitations -
1. Only detects one per line
2. The rest of the line will be shown in white on black - other colours will be discarded.

muclient.script: sub OnHyperlink (name, line, wildcards) ColourTell RGBColourToName (NormalColour(8)), _ RGBColourToName (NormalColour(1)), _ wildcards (1) Hyperlink wildcards (2), wildcards (2), "", "", "", 1 ColourNote RGBColourToName (NormalColour(8)), _ RGBColourToName (NormalColour(1)), _ wildcards (3) end sub
